mapper.insert: insert into tbl_request_token (requesttoken, requesttokensecret, consumerkey, verifier, callback, userno) values (#{requestToken}, #{requestTokenSecret}, #{consumerKey}, #{verifier}, #{callback}, -1)
mapper.delete: delete tbl_request_token where DATEDIFF(MINUTE, regdate, sysdate) > 60
mapper.select: select requesttoken, requesttokensecret, r.consumerkey, verifier, to_char(r.regdate,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') AS regdate, c.appName, r.callback, userNo from tbl_request_token r, tbl_consumer c where r.consumerKey = c.consumerKey and requesttoken = #{requestToken}
